function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of SARS-CoV-2 through ventilation ducts","Impact":"Potential for widespread infection within a building","Mitigation":"Implement improved ventilation systems and air filtration, as well as regular maintenance and cleaning of ventilation ducts","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration and purification systems","People":"Building occupants, especially in crowded indoor environments","Owner":"Building management and HVAC maintenance teams"},{"Description":"Fecal-oral transmission of SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission through contaminated fecal matter","Mitigation":"Ensure proper sanitation and hygiene measures, including regular cleaning and disinfection of facilities","Technologies":"Sanitation and disinfection equipment, automated sanitizer dispensers","People":"Building occupants and sanitation staff","Owner":"Building management and sanitation teams"},{"Description":"Inhalation transmission of SARS-CoV-2 in crowded indoor environments","Impact":"Higher probability of transmission under certain indoor conditions","Mitigation":"Increase fresh air ventilation, minimize indoor crowding, and implement air quality monitoring","Technologies":"Air quality monitors, ventilation control systems","People":"Building occupants in crowded indoor environments","Owner":"Building management and facility maintenance teams"}]}
